oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adams operations on classical compact Lie groups
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fok, Chi-Kwong
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Topology
Mathematics - K-Theory and Homology
19L50, 55N91
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let $G$ be $U(n)$, $SU(n)$, $Sp(n)$ or $Spin(n)$. In this short note we give explicit general formulas for Adams operations on $K^*(G)$, and eigenvectors of Adams operations on $K^*(U(n))$.
Comment: 14 pages. Exposition and typography improved. Grammatical mistakes corrected. Comments are welcome
